title: Handwrite font
content:
I have a logo that I'm vectoring... the work is almost all done... but I can't find the font that is used on it.  
Can someone help me, please?

Many thanks!!

Font: 

 ITC Bradley Hand 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131816/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Font Nesgotável.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131816/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%20Nesgot%C3%A1vel.jpg) | 7.74 KB |
author: m8r-vrpa5v

comments.content: It looks like a manually compressed **[ITC Bradley Hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131816/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ITC%20Bradley%20Hand%20Com%20-%20Regular&fid=f8ee5cdf1683bc5f2a99f7653aec1074&fsize=60&text=nesgotavel&wrap=2)**

I was coming to the same conclusion myself... I agree 100% with you! :)

Many thanks for the help!
